task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here are instructions for using the subtraction feature of the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must be familiar with the arithmetic process of subtraction.
taskbody.result: The result of the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation looks like this: 3 - 2 = 1. You enter 3, press the minus button, enter 2, and press the equals button. The result 1 appears on the screen.
